sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - பணிந்துகொள், தொழுதுகொள், வணங்கு, தாழவிழு, ஆராதனைசெய்
1. of homage shown to men of superior rank
2. of homage rendered to God and the ascended Christ, to heavenly beings, and to demons

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G4314 and probably a derivative of G2965 (meaning to kiss, like a dog licking his master’s hand); to fawn or crouch to, that is, (literally or figuratively) prostrate oneself in homage (do reverence to, adore): - worship.
Cognate: G4352, G4353
